text: La Verrerie is a municipality of the district of Veveyse in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2004, by the former municipalities of Le Crêt, Grattavache, and Progens merged to form La Verrerie.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 The municipality is administered from Le Crêt. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Veveyse
title: La Verrerie
